visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a line chart with the following specifications: Chart type is line, chart title is 'Monthly Average Temperature', axes and labels styling includes specific colors and font sizes, data series includes two series named 'Reggane' and 'Tallinn' with their respective monthly temperature data, custom colors are provided, and additional configurations include chart margins, background, and legend settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a line chart with a title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart type is set to 'line', and the background color is light gray. The x-axis represents the months with styled labels, and the y-axis represents the temperature in degrees Celsius with a styled title and labels. The data series includes two sets of monthly temperature data for 'Reggane' and 'Tallinn', each with a custom color. The legend is enabled and styled to match the overall theme. Additional configurations include setting the chart margins to ensure the title and axis labels are properly spaced.
